caption:
💥From Queens, NY to Atlanta, GA —> there’s a new coffee shop now open in Midtown Atlanta! 💥 

If you love exploring the coffee scene in and around Atlanta area, follow @atlantacoffeeshops, and subscribe to the Atlanta Coffee Shops (ACS) newsletter to stay in the know on all things ATL coffee—at the link in bio! 👀

Opened last week at a prime location of West Peachtree St. and 12th Streets (inside the @google building) is For Five Coffee Roasters (@forfive), a Queens, NYC-based roaster + coffee shop. The Atlanta location has been a long time coming, and ACS was aware of its pending opening going back to May 2021. The pandemic plans fell through, but the company pushed on and opened its doors in the ATL in late February 2025. The Atlanta location was worth waiting for — it is For Five’s biggest café by square footage (3,700 s.f.) across 30+ stores and represents a new flagship in Atlanta and the Southeast.

The interior features a modern aesthetic and a hotel-like lobby/interior. There is plenty of seating across the bar area, individual, and communal tables. Free Wi-Fi is available, and the coffee shop is open 7AM to 7PM daily. With this new ATL location, For Five is elevating every detail in a café experience.

As for coffee: the espresso here is Roc Center Espresso blend from @forfive (a blend of Brazilian, Colombian, and Indonesian coffee beans; tasting notes of lemon zest and cocoa).

A must-order on the coffee menu is the Freddo Cappuccino—get it iced—as that is a rare item to see on a coffee menu in Atlanta. 

The coffee shop also features a full assortment of pastries and a lunch menu—these would be worth exploring over multiple days in Midtown—as well as a popular stuffed cookie 🍪 menu (IYKYK). 

Swipe through this set to see the ACS Instagram preview of For Five Coffee Atlanta. To see the NEW landing page for For Five Atlanta, click the link in bio or navigate directly to https://www.atlantacoffeeshops.com/for-five

For Five Coffee Atlanta
📍1105 West Peachtree Street NW
Atlanta, GA 30309

Hours:
Monday to Sunday, 7AM to 7PM
From The Five Boroughs, For The World 🌎
